    API Overview

    API center gives access to user account management, registration,changing password,etc.

    Device management includes adding device, grouping device, etc.

    Device control allows to turn on/off devices, adjust color, color temperature,and brightness, share devices, set up timers on devices, etc.

    User Region

    API Description Documentation
    Region Get current region api/user/region

    Account Management

    API Description Documentation
    Verification code Get verification code to register or reset password api/sms
    Register Reiger APP account api/user/register
    Reset password Reset password with verification code sent to account email or phone number. /api/user/password/reset
    Change password Change password by old password /api/user/password
    Login Login APP api/user/login
    token Refresh When access token expires，refresh tocken to get new token api/user/refresh

    Device Management

    API Description Documentation
    Device List Get all devices in account, including devices shared by others api/user/device
    Check Device Check device info by Device ID api/user/device/:deviceid
    Add Device Add device to user account api/user/device/add
    Delete Device Delete device from user account api/user/device/:deviceid
    Change Device Name Change name of device api/user/device/:deviceid
    ADD GSM Device Scan QR code to add GSM device api/user/device/addGsm
    Add Group Manage the groups of devices api/group
    Change Group Change name of group and its order in app api/group
    Delete Group 1,Delete group 2,Delete group and devices in this group api/group
    Add Device to Group Add device to a group api/group/addDevice
    Check Group Get complete group info of device api/group

    Device Control

    • WebSocket Protocol All API in table below uses WebSocket except for Server Dispatch.
    API Description Documentation
    Server Dispatch Get info for persistent connection dispatch/app
    Handshake Complete authorization when creating connection,client report environment data,server returns configuration data Handshake
    Device Online/Offline When server end detects device going online or offline, app will be notified of the update.Such notification is sent by server automatically. No need to request from app. Device Online/Offline
    Update/Report Status Change device status,such as turn on/off device,change color, brightness,color temperature and setting all kinds of timers Update/Report Status
    Check Device Status Device and app send this command to server, to check device status or parameters, such as device on/off, whether any timer is set and so on. Check Device Status
    Share Device Share device with other user,allowing one device under control of multiple users Share
    Update Share Update share or permissions Change Share
    Cancel Share Cancel share Cancel Share
    • HTTP Protocol
    API Description Documentation
    Check Device Status Device and app send this command to server, to check device status or parameters, such as device on/off, whether any timer is set and so on. api/user/device/status
    Update Device Status Change device status, such as on/off, color,brightness,color temperature,and setting all kinds of timers. api/user/device/status
